------------------------------------------------
Strong guitar rock with superb female vocals - a must listen for all modern rock fans. "Engaging . Cohesive" -- Taxi

-------------------------------------------------

With the release of their second full-length album, Broken Girl, Panic Attack is poised to continue to grow their core audience and expand their fan base throughout the country.

A raw expression of the band&#039;s experience over a year of change and growth, the ten songs featured on this CD were developed as a complete collection that can be enjoyed individually or as a continuous listening experience.

The reviews are rolling in:

"Broken Girl ... A nice entry into the track ... storyline is masterfully created and delivered. The vocals capture the anxiety and ride comfortably over the sonic surges. There is a subtle tension that will draw in listeners. Engaging .. Cohesive."  -- Taxi
